translated: The Sutra Spoken by the Buddha on the Lord of Heaven
Cast bronze to make pillars. Elephant tusks make roof beams. Tiger amber makes roof tiles. Pearls
Make nets. Constellations make roof peaks. Sun and moon make latticed windows. It can last for
Ten thousand years.
Above is a small eon.
Below is a yojana.
Although this sutra is small, it has great spiritual power.
It is equal to the Lotus Sutra.
It is equal to the Nirvana Sutra.
It is also a miscellaneous sutra.
It is like the Eastern Sea.
It is like Mount Tai.
Entering the sea to obtain treasures.
According to their quantity, one can obtain a heavy reward upon return.
Entering the mountains to obtain materials.
According to the length of the timber, one can obtain a heavy reward upon return.
Who can copy this sutra?
The spiral pattern on the hand will be formed.
Who can read this sutra?
The eyes will produce double vision.
Who can recite this sutra?
One will be greatly wise throughout the eons.

In the center of the lecture hall, the ground was made of lapis lazuli.

In front, he ascended the golden bed, and behind, the king stood holding the golden sutra.
When he reached the Buddha's teachings, he said:
Remember the Buddha as you remember food.
Think of the Buddha as you think of your life.
Recite five times a day.
Eliminate one million five hundred thousand kalpas of offenses.
